channel.title: Blogs on SEO with Charan.com
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on SEO with Charan.com

item.title: How I Improved A Client's Technical SEO By 228%
item.description: A case study of a recent client I had whose website’s Technical SEO and Site Struture Scores I improved by 228% singlehandedly in just 12 days!!

item.title: Repeating Keywords Won't Help SEO
item.description: A Big Myth-Buster: Keyword Density is NOT a ranking factor. Read here why Google’s new update does NOT consider Keyword Density, so keyword optimizing your content is now a thing of the past….

item.title: How Does WhatsApp Make Money?
item.description: WhatsApp is everyone’s favourite chat app. It has a 5 Billion Dollar valuation. But… Its free, right? You never paid a penny for it. So where does it earn?

item.title: Oyo Tinder & A Great Idea We All Need To Consider
Mcdonalds and Rs. 45 Crore Deal That Changed Its Future
item.description: Why did McDonalds spend Rs. 45 Crore on an unknown singer to sing a single melody, and how this single melody changed the course of its entire future…

item.title: Jio Meet vs Zoom | The Marketing Hack To Remember...
item.description: Even after having all the resources, why did Ambani still choose to copy? Cause he already had a brilliant marketing stunt planned. A stunt to get millions of people to talk about Jio Meet. And that too, without spending a single penny!

item.title: Things Not Working Out? Time To Find Your Popcorn!
item.description: The real story behind why popcorns are over-priced in cinemas, and what we can learn from it…

item.title: The Power Of A Single YouTube Comment: BINOD
item.description: How a single YouTube comment took the world by a storm, trended on Twitter, and even made Paytm change its official name on Twitter

item.title: How Nokia Never Did Anything Wrong, Yet Still Lost
item.description: The sad story of the downfall of the leading mobile phone company Nokia, falling from being THE only market leader, to now, fighting to stay alive, just like any other competitor…

item.title: How To Turn A Fake 20$ to Millions!
item.description: A brilliant marketing hack by a small lawnmower company in the 19th century, which is still relevant today.
